item.title: 诊断检测需求强劲，Labcorp上调年度利润预期
item.description: 由于诊断测试需求强劲，Labcorp 周四上调了全年利润预期，第二季度利润和收入均超过华尔街预期。【原文：Labcorp raised its annual profit forecast on Thursday after beating Wall Street estimates for second-quarter profit and revenue on robust demand for its diagnostic tests.】

item.title: 部长表示，美国和印尼正在讨论关键矿产贸易的战略管理问题
item.description: 印尼一位部长周四在介绍两国正在进行的会谈细节时说，美国和印尼正在讨论采取联合措施，以监督和管理印尼具有战略价值的关键矿物的贸易。【原文：The United States and Indonesia are discussing joint measures to monitor and manage trade in Indonesian critical minerals that have strategic value, an Indonesian minister said on Thursday as he gave details of ongoing talks between the two countries.】

item.title: 早间竞标：贸易宽松、商务提升、市场高涨
item.description: 当今美国和全球市场的重要事件【原文：What matters in US and global markets today】

item.title: 咨询业务因交易反弹而受益，拉扎德利润上升
item.description: 投资银行拉扎德（Lazard）周四公布，由于交易活动反弹，其咨询收入增加，第二季度利润大幅增长 11%。【原文：Investment bank Lazard reported an 11% jump in second-quarter profit on Thursday, as a rebound in dealmaking activity lifted its advisory revenue.】

item.title: 瓦莱罗能源公司报告第二季度利润下降
item.description: 瓦莱罗能源公司（Valero Energy）周四报告称，受吞吐量下降的影响，第二季度利润下降。【原文：Refiner Valero Energy reported a fall in second-quarter profit on Thursday, hurt by lower throughput volumes.】

item.title: 投资者权衡 Alphabet 和特斯拉财报，华尔街期货涨跌不一
item.description: 周四，美国股指期货涨跌不一，投资者在评估 Alphabet 和特斯拉盈利的同时，也在关注美国与其主要合作伙伴之间贸易协议的进展。【原文：U.S. stock index futures were mixed on Thursday as investors assessed earnings from Alphabet and Tesla while focusing on progress in trade deals between the U.S. and its top partners.】

item.title: 墨西哥水泥公司重组启动，利润实现两位数增长
item.description: 墨西哥水泥生产商 Cemex 周四公布，尽管销售额下降，但第二季度利润仍有两位数的增长，因为其新管理层推出了一项重组计划，其中包括裁员数千人。【原文：Mexican cement producer Cemex posted a double-digit increase in second-quarter profit on Thursday, despite a dip in sales, as its new management rolled out a restructuring program that included thousands of layoffs.】

item.title: 道指削减股息，亏损额高于预期
item.description: 陶氏公司周四公布的季度亏损超过预期，并在行业长期低迷的情况下将股息减半，导致这家化学品生产商的股价在盘前交易中下跌超过 7%。【原文：Dow Inc reported a bigger-than-expected quarterly loss on Thursday and halved its dividend amid a prolonged industry downturn, sending shares of the chemicals maker down over 7% in premarket trading.】

item.title: 特朗普削减补贴，美国清洁能源热潮褪去
item.description: 总部位于新加坡的太阳能电池板制造商比拉太阳能公司（Bila Solar）正在暂停将其位于印第安纳波利斯的新工厂产能翻番的计划。加拿大竞争对手Heliene公司在明尼苏达州的太阳能电池工厂计划正在接受审查。挪威太阳能硅片制造商 NorSun 正在评估是否继续推进在俄克拉荷马州塔尔萨市建厂的计划。而美国东北部两个完全获准的海上风电场可能永远无法建成。【原文：Singapore-based solar panel manufacturer Bila Solar is suspending plans to double capacity at its new factory in Indianapolis. Canadian rival Heliene’s plans for a solar cell facility in Minnesota are under review. Norwegian solar wafer maker NorSun is evaluating whether to move forward with a planned factory in Tulsa, Oklahoma. And two fully permitted offshore wind farms in the U.S. Northeast may never get built.】

item.title: 堂食需求疲软影响全年销售预期，Chipotle 墨西哥烤肉店业绩下滑
item.description: 周四收盘前，Chipotle Mexican Grill 的股价暴跌约 10%，原因是消费者外出就餐支出疲软导致该公司季度销售额降幅超过预期，并导致这家大碗和卷饼生产商调低了年度销售目标。【原文：Chipotle Mexican Grill's shares slumped about 10% before the bell on Thursday, as weak consumer spending on dining out led to a bigger-than-expected fall in quarterly sales and caused the bowls and burritos maker to temper its annual sales target.】

item.title: Meme 股票大涨凸显市场泡沫，主要集中在散户投资者身上
item.description: 科尔百货公司（Kohl's）和开放技术公司（Opendoor Technologies）等股票的大幅波动引发了人们的疑问，即是否正在掀起新一轮的meme股票交易浪潮，以及这是否预示着更广泛的风险偏好。【原文：Massive moves in stocks such as Kohl’s and Opendoor Technologies are raising questions over whether a new wave of meme stock trading is underway and what that signals about risk appetite more broadly.】

item.title: 特朗普关税给巴西柑橘带造成严重破坏
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普计划从8月1日起对所有巴西产品征收50%的新关税，这可能会对南美国家的柑橘带造成毁灭性打击，因为在价格急剧下降的情况下，工厂会缩减生产，橘农也会考虑让水果自生自灭。【原文：President Donald Trump's plan to impose a new 50% tariff on all Brazilian products from Aug. 1 could devastate the South American nation's citrus belt, as factories scale back production and orange farmers consider leaving fruit to rot amid a sharp drop in prices.】

item.title: 霍尼韦尔上调 2025 年预期，因航空航天零部件和服务需求持续增长
item.description: 霍尼韦尔周四公布了第二季度利润和收入的增长，尽管围绕关税的经济背景尚不确定，但受航空航天零部件和维护服务需求强劲的推动，霍尼韦尔上调了全年业绩预期。【原文：Honeywell raised its annual forecasts after posting a rise in second-quarter profit and revenue on Thursday, buoyed by strong demand for its aerospace parts and maintenance services despite an uncertain economic backdrop surrounding tariffs.】

item.title: 特斯拉前路艰难，希望机器人轴抵消销量下滑
item.description: 特斯拉及其首席执行官埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）正在走一条越来越难走的钢丝，因为该公司正面临电动汽车销量下滑和自动驾驶业务尚未起步的困境。【原文：Tesla and its CEO Elon Musk are walking an increasingly difficult tightrope as the company navigates declining electric vehicle sales and an autonomous driving business that has yet to get off the ground.】

item.title: 俄罗斯称关税上涨威胁美国和全球经济
item.description: 俄罗斯外交部发言人玛丽亚-扎哈罗娃（Maria Zakharova）周四表示，贸易关税的上升给美国和整个世界的经济带来了风险。【原文：Russian Foreign Ministry spokeswoman Maria Zakharova said on Thursday that rising trade tariffs carried risks for the economy of the United States and the whole world.】

item.title: 部长称塞尔维亚寻求延长美国对石油公司 NIS 的制裁豁免期限
item.description: 塞尔维亚矿业和能源部长周四表示，塞尔维亚已寻求美国将对俄罗斯拥有的塞尔维亚石油公司NIS的制裁豁免延长180天。【原文：Serbia has sought an extension from the United States on a sanctions waiver for Russian-owned Serbian oil company NIS for an additional 180 days, Serbia's mining and energy minister said on Thursday.】

item.title: 伟大的牛仔裤悉尼-斯威尼（Sydney Sweeney）的竞选活动推动了美国之鹰的反弹
item.description: 美国鹰服饰公司（American Eagle Outfitters）与悉尼-斯威尼（Sydney Sweeney）合作推出新款牛仔裤广告后，周四大涨 16%，这家服装零售商寄希望于《极乐世界》和《白莲花》的女主角来重振销售业绩，并与 Z 世代的购物者重新建立联系。【原文：American Eagle Outfitters surged 16% on Thursday after unveiling a new denim campaign with Sydney Sweeney, as the apparel retailer bets on the "Euphoria" and "The White Lotus" actress to reignite sales and reconnect with Gen Z shoppers.】

item.title: 贸易部长称马来西亚在美国谈判中的目标是尽可能低的关税率
item.description: 马来西亚贸易部长周四表示，马来西亚的目标是对出口到美国的商品征收尽可能低的关税，并否认了有关马来西亚将目标税率定为 20% 的报道。【原文：Malaysia is aiming for the lowest possible tariff on goods exported to the United States, its trade minister said on Thursday, denying reports that it is targeting a rate of 20%.】

item.title: 调查显示近三成德国企业推迟美国投资
item.description: Ifo周四的一项调查显示，由于美国总统唐纳德-特朗普关税政策的不确定性，近30%有美国投资计划的德国企业推迟了项目，15%取消了项目。【原文：Almost 30% of German companies with investment plans in the United States have postponed their projects and 15% have cancelled them due to uncertainty over U.S. President Donald Trump's tariff policy, an Ifo survey showed on Thursday.】

item.title: 中国比亚迪将从 2026 年起在巴基斯坦组装电动汽车
item.description: 中国电动汽车巨头比亚迪公司一位高管周三表示，该公司计划于2026年7月或8月在巴基斯坦推出首款组装汽车，以满足该地区对电动汽车和插电式混合动力汽车日益增长的需求。【原文：Chinese electric vehicle giant BYD plans to roll out its first car assembled in Pakistan by July or August 2026 to capture growing demand for electric and plug-in hybrid vehicles in the region, a company executive said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 美国议员追问五角大楼在微软交易中使用中国工程师的细节
item.description: 一位美国立法者周四要求美国国防部提供更多细节，说明作为与微软签订的云计算服务合同的一部分，美国军方与中国工程师共享了哪些信息。【原文：A U.S. lawmaker on Thursday pressed the U.S. Defense Department for further details on what information the U.S. military shared with Chinese engineers as part of a cloud computing services contract with Microsoft.】

item.title: 沃尔玛押注人工智能超级代理，促进电子商务增长
item.description: 沃尔玛周四公布了推出一套由人工智能驱动的 "超级代理 "的计划，旨在改善顾客的购物体验并简化运营。【原文：Walmart unveiled plans on Thursday to roll out a suite of AI-powered "super agents" designed to improve the shopping experience for customers and streamline operations.】

item.title: 市场押注中国政府正认真对待中国产能过剩问题
item.description: 本月，从钢铁到多晶硅等大宗商品价格飙升，因为中国投资者押注中国政府最终将认真解决世界第二大经济体的产能过剩问题。【原文：Commodity prices from steel to polysilicon have surged this month as Chinese investors bet Beijing is finally serious about addressing overcapacity across the world's second-largest economy.】

item.title: 欧元区 7 月份商业活动增长创 11 个月新高，PMI 显示
item.description: 周四的一项调查显示，欧元区本月的商业活动增速快于预期，这主要得益于该集团占主导地位的服务业的稳健改善，同时制造业也显示出进一步复苏的迹象。【原文：Euro zone business activity accelerated faster than forecast this month, supported by a solid improvement in the bloc's dominant services industry and with manufacturing showing further signs of recovery, a survey showed on Thursday.】

item.title: 德国 7 月制造业采购经理人指数（PMI）显示德国私营部门增长依然不温不火
item.description: 周四的一项调查显示，由于制造业产出连续第五个月增长，服务业活动趋于稳定，7 月份德国商业活动继续小幅增长，但增速略低于 6 月份。【原文：German business activity continued to grow marginally in July, though at a slightly slower pace than in June, as manufacturing output expanded for a fifth consecutive month and services activity stabilised, a survey showed on Thursday.】

item.title: 由于石油和天然气价格下跌，道达尔能源公司（TotalEnergies）季度收入下降 23
item.description: 道达尔能源公司（TotalEnergies）周四公布的第二季度盈利下降了 23%，这是这家法国石油巨头四年来的最差表现，原因是上游产量的增加未能抵消石油、天然气和精炼燃料盈利的下降。【原文：TotalEnergies reported a 23% fall in second-quarter earnings on Thursday, the French oil major's worst performance in four years, as higher upstream production failed to offset lower earnings from oil, gas, and refined fuels.】

item.title: 中国计划建立网络出售剩余计算能力，以解决数据中心过剩问题
item.description: 在中国涌现出数千个由地方政府支持的数据中心，造成容量过剩并威胁到其生存能力之后，中国正在采取措施建立一个网络来出售计算能力，并遏制数据中心的过快增长。【原文：China is taking steps to build a network to sell computing power and curb the unwieldy growth of data centres after thousands of local government-backed centres that sprouted in the country caused a capacity glut and threatened their viability.】

item.title: 英美资源集团上半年铜和钻石产量下降
item.description: 全球矿业公司英美资源集团（Anglo American）周四报告称，由于需求持续低迷，今年上半年铜产量下降了13%，降至34.22万吨，毛坯钻石产量下降了26%。【原文：Global miner Anglo American on Thursday reported a 13% fall in copper production in the first half of the year to 342,200 metric tons, and a 26% fall in rough diamonds, as demand remains sluggish.】

item.title: 特斯拉业绩公布后股价下跌近 6
item.description: 特斯拉股价周四在欧洲早盘交易中下跌近 6%，此前埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的电动汽车制造商公布了十多年来最严重的季度销售下滑。【原文：Tesla shares fell nearly 6% in early trading in Europe on Thursday, after Elon Musk's electric vehicle maker posted its worst quarterly decline in sales in over a decade.】

item.title: 解说：俄罗斯卢布表现优异的原因及其意义
item.description: 自今年年初以来，俄罗斯卢布兑美元汇率上涨了 45%，成为全球表现最好的货币之一，但事实证明，大幅升值对受到严厉制裁的俄罗斯经济来说是一把双刃剑。【原文：The Russian rouble's 45% rise against the U.S. dollar since the start of the year has made it one of the world's best performing currencies - but the sharp appreciation is proving to be a double-edged sword for the heavily sanctioned Russian economy.】
